CustomField.description: The Payable Item type being paid for (e.g. Fee, Invoice Item, etc.), can be used as a parameter to create different ledger treatments for the same trigger event.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Payable Item type being paid for (e.g. Fee, Invoice Item, etc.), can be used as a parameter to create different ledger treatments for the same trigger event.
CustomField.label: Payable Item Type
